org.zaproxy.zap.scan

Interface ScannerThreadManager<ScannerThread extends BaseScannerThread<?>,ScanTarget>

  • Type Parameters:
    ScannerThread - the type of scanner
    ScanTarget - the main target of a scan thread (e.g. Context, SiteNode, domain).
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseScannerThreadManager

    public interface ScannerThreadManager<ScannerThread extends BaseScannerThread<?>,ScanTarget>
    An utility class used to manage the scanner threads that have been created for a particular scan type and/or extension.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearThreads()
      Clear threads.
      Collection<ScannerThread> getAllThreads()
      Gets the all threads.
      ScannerThread getScannerThread(ScanTarget scanTarget)
      Gets the scanner thread for a target.
      ScannerThread recreateScannerThreadIfHasRun(ScanTarget scanTarget)
      Recreate the scanner thread for a target if it has already run.
      void stopAllScannerThreads()
      Stop all scans.
